Title: Trapdoor Sprung
Description:
We need time to get the Reckoning ready. Take your friends and hold back the nerubians for as long as you can.

They deserve nothing but death for what they have done to our people.
ObjectivesText: Kill 15 nerubians in Livia's Patience in Hallowfall.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet your allies in Livia's Patience.
RewardText: Good job, $n. I'm surprised the nerubians aren't fleeing already!
